txt.en: Near Dawn, 65th Day of my Exile\n\nI followed Galachán tonight. I needed to know where he gets these spells. He heard me once, I thought, but continued into Gundabad. We went deep into the mountain, into places that I have never been before. That familiar smell hit me long before we reached the cavern from which the crystals are harvested. Will it ever not make me gag? I dream of that filthy stink. It is nearly worse than the piles of refuse the hobgoblins leave rotting in their camps.
